verses.verse: בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> ba-'Et At that time הַהִ֡וא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hiv he שָׁלַ֡ח <S%H7971><s%> sha-Lach sent מְרֹדַ֣ךְ me-ro-Dach בַּ֠לְאֲדָן <S%H4757><s%> Bal-'a-don Merodachbaladan בֶּֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son בַּלְאֲדָ֧ן <S%H1081><s%> bal-'a-Dan of Baladan מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king בָּבֶ֛ל <S%H894><s%> ba-Vel of Babylon סְפָרִ֥ים <S%H5612><s%> se-fa-Rim letters וּמִנְחָ֖ה <S%H4503><s%> u-min-Chah and a present אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to חִזְקִיָּ֑הוּ <S%H2396><s%> chiz-ki-Ya-hu; to Hezekiah וַיִּשְׁמַ֕ע <S%H8085><s%> vai-yish-Ma' for he had heard כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for חָלָ֖ה <S%H2470><s%> cha-Lah that he had been sick וַֽיֶּחֱזָֽק׃ <S%H2388><s%> Vai-ye-che-Zak. and was recovered

וַיָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo Then came יְשַׁעְיָ֣הוּ <S%H3470><s%> ye-sha'-Ya-hu Isaiah הַנָּבִ֔יא <S%H5030><s%> han-na-Vi, the prophet אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech unto king חִזְקִיָּ֑הוּ <S%H2396><s%> chiz-ki-Ya-hu; Hezekiah וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav to him מָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> mah What אָמְר֣וּ׀ <S%H559><s%> 'a-me-Ru unto him What said הָאֲנָשִׁ֣ים <S%H582><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim another הָאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh, these וּמֵאַ֙יִן֙ <S%H370><s%> u-me-'A-yin where יָבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo-'u came אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha, about וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said חִזְקִיָּ֔הוּ <S%H2396><s%> chiz-ki-Ya-hu, they unto thee;And Hezekiah מֵאֶ֧רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz country רְחוֹקָ֛ה <S%H7350><s%> re-cho-Kah from a far בָּ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> Ba-'u They are come אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai from מִבָּבֶֽל׃ <S%H894><s%> mib-ba-Vel. unto me [even] from Babylon

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Then said מָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> mah What רָא֖וּ <S%H7200><s%> ra-'U he What have they seen בְּבֵיתֶ֑ךָ <S%H1004><s%> be-vei-Te-cha; All that [is] in mine house וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer answered חִזְקִיָּ֗הוּ <S%H2396><s%> chiz-ki-Ya-hu, Hezekiah אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher is in בְּבֵיתִי֙ <S%H1004><s%> be-vei-Ti house רָא֔וּ <S%H7200><s%> ra-'U, have they seen לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah become דָבָ֛ר <S%H1697><s%> da-Var there is nothing אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- have not הִרְאִיתִ֖ים <S%H7200><s%> hir-'i-Tim that I have not shewed בְּאוֹצְרֹתָֽי׃ <S%H214><s%> be-'otz-ro-Tai. among my treasures

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Then said יְשַׁעְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3470><s%> ye-sha'-Ya-hu Isaiah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to חִזְקִיָּ֑הוּ <S%H2396><s%> chiz-ki-Ya-hu; to Hezekiah שְׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> she-Ma' Hear דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- the word יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot. of hosts

הִנֵּה֮ <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold יָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim Behold the days בָּאִים֒ <S%H935><s%> ba-'Im come וְנִשָּׂ֣א׀ <S%H5375><s%> ve-nis-Sa shall be carried כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher is in בְּבֵיתֶ֗ךָ <S%H1004><s%> be-vei-Te-cha, that all that [is] in thine house וַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher after אָצְר֧וּ <S%H686><s%> 'a-tze-Ru have laid up in store אֲבֹתֶ֛יךָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tei-cha and [that] which thy fathers עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom until this day הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh to this בָּבֶ֑ל <S%H894><s%> ba-Vel; to Babylon לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not יִוָּתֵ֥ר <S%H3498><s%> yiv-va-Ter shall be left דָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> da-Var nothing אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Then said חִזְקִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H2396><s%> chiz-ki-Ya-hu Hezekiah אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְשַׁעְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3470><s%> ye-sha'-Ya-hu, to Isaiah ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov Good דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- [is] the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which דִּבַּ֑רְתָּ <S%H1696><s%> dib-Bar-ta; which thou hast spoken וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer He said כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for יִהְיֶ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become שָׁל֥וֹם <S%H7965><s%> sha-Lom moreover For there shall be peace וֶאֱמֶ֖ת <S%H571><s%> ve-'e-Met and truth בְּיָמָֽי׃ <S%H3117><s%> be-ya-Mai. in my days פ Peh
